NODE.name: Inject
NODE.HELP: When matching topics, this node injects some Modifications into existing Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Write
NODE.HELP: Writes into Fields of arbitrary Type.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Default
NODE.HELP: Constructs a Message according to a fixed Formular
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Edit
NODE.HELP: Adds or edits multiple Message FieldNames
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Create
NODE.HELP: Joins a Message from custom dynamic pins
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Reflect
NODE.HELP: Transcode any VL type to Message
NODE.TODO: Help patch "Reflect (Object) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: ConfigKeep
NODE.HELP: Joins a permanent Message from custom dynamic pins
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Select
NODE.HELP: Select Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: vvvv-sdk
NODE.TODO: Help patch "Select (Message) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: Zip
NODE.HELP: Zip Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: vvvv-sdk
NODE.TODO: Help patch "Zip (Message Bin) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: UnZip
NODE.HELP: UnZip Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: vvvv-sdk
NODE.TODO: Help patch "UnZip (Message) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: SafeKeep
NODE.HELP: Stores Messages according to their address and keeps them updated
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: AvoidNil
NODE.HELP: Avoid empty spreads of Messages. Usually just above a split node.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome
NODE.TODO: Help patch "AvoidNil (Message Formular) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: Read
NODE.HELP: Reads spreadable Fields of arbitrary Type from all incoming Messages. Can convert some types.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: StoreKeep
NODE.HELP: Keeps all Messages that ever came in.
NODE.TODO: Help patch "StoreKeep (Message) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: SiftCommon
NODE.HELP: Find identical Messages in two spreads
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome
NODE.TODO: Help patch "SiftCommon (Message) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: Sort
NODE.HELP: Sort Messages by a field
NODE.WARNINGS: Uninitialized fields in Messages might corrupt order. BinSizing Keys is ignored.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: GetSlice
NODE.HELP: GetSlice Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome
NODE.TODO: Help patch "GetSlice (Message) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: Clone
NODE.HELP: Clones Messages to prevent overriding an instance somewhere else. Slow.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Cons
NODE.HELP: Removes redundancy and null

NODE.name: Change
NODE.HELP: Detects and handles upstream changes and forwards them downstream.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: ContainsField
NODE.HELP: Tells if a Message contains a certain attribute indicated by Name
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: FrameDelay
NODE.HELP: Allows Feedback Loops for Messages. Can be NIL'ed at will.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome
NODE.TODO: Help patch "FrameDelay (Message) help.v4p" not found

NODE.name: HoldKeep
NODE.HELP: Holds the last bunch of Messages that traveled through. Pick some or all.

NODE.name: Info
NODE.HELP: Help to Debug Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: PruneEmpty
NODE.HELP: Removes all empty fields of any Message
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Prune
NODE.HELP: Removes all Fields with the indicated name from any Message
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: PruneBut
NODE.HELP: Removes all fields of any Message but the ones indicated by Name
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Sift
NODE.HELP: Filter Messages
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Split
NODE.HELP: Splits a Message into custom dynamic pins
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Read
NODE.HELP: Reads spreadable Fields of arbitrary Type from all incoming Messages. Can convert some types. Features fully spreaded AvoidNil capabilities, and a handy Swapdim Flip
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: SessionKeep
NODE.HELP: Stores Messages according to their id (which can be its Topic and/or specific fields) and removes them, if no change was detected for a certain time
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Reflection
NODE.HELP: Outputs the current configuration of a Formular
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: Formular
NODE.HELP: Define a high level Template for Messages

NODE.name: Topic
NODE.HELP: Change the topic of Messages

NODE.name: Remove
NODE.HELP: Remove specific messages
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: RemoveEmpty
NODE.HELP: Remove empty messages
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: RenameField
NODE.HELP: Renames specific fields inside a Message.
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome

NODE.name: AsMsgPack
NODE.HELP: Serialize Messages to binary
NODE.AUTHOR: velcrome
